table_description: Information about project descriptions, including ID, name, owner, and associated environments.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the project.

columns.name: createdAt
columns.description: The timestamp of when the project was created.

columns.name: updatedAt
columns.description: The timestamp of the last update to the project.

columns.name: owner
columns.description: Information about the owner of the project.

columns.name: environmentIds
columns.description: A list of environment IDs associated with the project.
